trans-unit.source: Light object that projects its effect along a direction specified by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>.
DirectionalLight objects have no position in space.
Creates an instance of a light that projects its effect in a specified direction.
This contructor creates an instance of a white light projected along a Vector3D of value `(0,0,-1)`.
DirectionalLights have a direction, but no position in space.
Creates an instance of a light that projects its effect along a specified Vector3D with a specified color.
DirectionalLights have a direction, but no position in space.
Diffuse color of the new light.
Direction of the new light.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
Represents the vector along which the light's effect will be seen on models in a 3-D scene.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
Vector3D along which the light projects, and which must have a non-zero magnitude.
The default value is `(0,0,-1)`.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight.Direction*> dependency property.
To be added.
